id3VybDovL2RvY3MudjEvZG9jOmM5YjY4NmNiN2N.value: Kemira is a global chemicals company serving customers in water-intensive industries. The company provides expertise in applications and chemicals that improve customers' efficient use of water, energy and raw materials. Kemira’s two segments Pulp & Paper and Industry & Water focus on customers in the pulp & paper, oil & gas, mining and water treatment industries, respectively.
